bug.author: golee
bug.description: Can't open project file (*.vott) Some closing curly brackets are omitted about end of the file. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1129665/56412034-da296e00-62bd-11e9-8489-6a0efbedd477.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/golee>@golee</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting this. We have not seen this in any of our testing over the past few months leading up to the new release. Can you give us some more information? What platform are running on? Can you easily reproduce this? What are the steps?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wbreza>@wbreza</denchmark-link>
OS: Windows 10 You can reproduce this by insert some letter which size is larger than 1 byte at Connection 'Display Name'. e.g. ðŸ˜‚, ì½”íŠ¸, æ¼¢ And then save, load the project by click 'Open Local Project' from project file (*.vott) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1129665/56778134-d642a200-680f-11e9-97d8-21858ae2a5fc.png></denchmark-link>
Thanks for the information <denchmark-link:https://github.com/golee>@golee</denchmark-link> - We will review your pull request.
We are having the same issue here, are there any updates?
